ResumeParserData.Experience: HSBC Holdings plc  Lead Business Analyst  February 2011 - Present  Manchester, UK  Requirements Gathering : Orchestrated comprehensive requirements gathering sessions with stakeholders across multiple departments.  Process Improvement : Spearheaded initiatives that enhanced operational efficiency by 25%.  Data Analysis : Leveraged Excel, SQL, and Tableau to perform in-depth data analysis, informing strategic decisions.  Project Management : Led numerous projects from inception to completion, utilizing Agile and Waterfall methodologies.  Stakeholder Communication : Maintained transparent communication channels with stakeholders, ensuring project goals were met.  Compliance and Risk Management : Ensured all projects adhered to regulatory standards and internal policies.  Standard Chartered Bank  Senior Business Analyst  August 2006 - January 2011  Manchester, UK  Requirements Gathering : Managed the collection and documentation of business requirements.  Process Improvement : Identified and implemented process improvements, leading to a 15% cost reduction.  Data Analysis : Conducted detailed data analysis to support strategic planning.  Project Management : Coordinated projects, ensuring timely delivery and compliance with quality standards.  Stakeholder Communication : Facilitated clear communication between business and technical teams.  Royal Bank of Scotland (RBS)  Business Analyst  June 2002 - July 2006  Manchester, UK  Requirements Gathering : Assisted in the documentation and analysis of business requirements.  Process Improvement : Contributed to process optimization projects, improving overall efficiency.  Data Analysis : Supported senior analysts in data analysis tasks.  Project Management : Participated in project planning and execution.  Stakeholder Communication : Communicated effectively with various project stakeholders.
